'''Rain of Stone''' is [[Zhongli]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*Zhongli's 5th Normal Attack will not produce [[Wood]] upon hitting trees.
*{{TalentNote|character=Zhongli|talent=Rain of Stone|ascension|2|Dominance of Earth|increases his Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG by 1.39% of his Max HP.}}
